But lately I‚Äôve been pretty down, and listening to a lot of the the Innocence Mission, particularly Glow, which I think, it is safe to say, is my favorite IM record of their substantial catalog.

I‚Äôm surprised some of my friends who are so into slowcore/shoegazer/whatever aren‚Äôt more into IM. If you get hooked on the Innocence Mission after that, I would suggest Birds of My Neighborhood, then Befriended (more mp3s from those two records on their site) or Small Planes.
